postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
One nice common room for rent to single professional or student in my 3+1, ground floor, fully furnished and aircon condo unit in 31 Moonstone Lane, Moonstone View Condo.     Landed Property Living, Condo Facilities! 
 
Monthly rental: SGD920 
Available: From 1st Feb 2017 for a minimum lease of 6 months 
Prefer: single professional or student 
No agent fee. 
No landlord staying. 
Fully furnished. 
Light cooking allowed. 
Utilities: shared. 
No pets is allowed. 
Please contact me (landlord): Mobile 
  show contact info 
(call/sms/WhatsApp) 
Current flatmates: 2 male Indian professionals (one is single and another married with working professional Filipino wife) are occupying the other 2 rooms. They are very friendly, helpful and easy going people. 
 
Condo Location: Centrally located outside Toa Payoh and is near to the junction of Jalan Toa Payoh/serangoon Road Flyover (PIE) and is also near Potong Pasir MRT station (around 8 minutes walk; 15 minutes to Orchard Road and 10 minutes to Dhoby Ghaut by MRT, 2 MRT stations to nex Shopping Mall...), bus stops (within 2-4 minutes walk, with many buses going to the city, Raffles Place, Suntec City, Marina Financial Centre, Toa Payoh Centre, Little India/Mustafa and City Square Shopping Malls, downtown, Habourfront and various parts of Singapore), and amenities (shops, eateries, supermarkets, schools and banks). It is also very convenient for students who are studying in NUS-Bukit Timah Campus (already 3 batches NUS students stayed in this condo) and SMU-Bras Basah Road campus. 
 
Some e.g. of public transport connectivities:  
more than 5 bus numbers (3 stops only) toToa Payoh Centre; Bus  No.147 to Serangoon Centre (nex Shopping Centre); Bus 857 and Bus 133 to City Hall/Suntec in 20 mins; 5 bus stops to Lavender MRT; 3 bus stops to Little India/Kitchener Road; 3 bus stops via PIE to Eunos MRT station in 15 mins and 20 mins to Marin Parade... 
 
Condo Facilities: Swimming pool, gym, sauna, BBQ pit, playground, function hall, basement car/bicyclepark, 24-hour security, etc, and is facing the beautiful Kallang River with quiet and calm environment surrounded by palm trees and plants. It is excellent for study and staying. 
 
Unit Facilities: Big hall and patio, fully furnished with aircon, big wardrobes, sofa, dinning set, beds (a queen bed, computer table in this common room), 3 bathroom/toilets, fridge, TV, washing machine, cooker, oven, water heater, microwave-oven. . .. 
 
Please call/sms to landlord at 
  show contact info 
(call/sms/WhatsApp) for a discussion/viewing. 
Thank you. 
Aaron Chu

Common /Master room with Attached Bathroom. 
No Landlord live in. 
No agency fees. 
Next to MRT station. 
 
Common/Master rooms for rent : specially for students or expatriates on employment assignments. 
Available in a 3 storey Landed house, in a private residential estate in central Singapore,  
200 metres from Eunos MRT station (Green -East West Line), 
 Near to all amenities like Banks, Clinics, Salons, shops, supermarket, Food courts.  
 
There are 5 rooms in this house for rent, and the Landlord does not live in. 
Tenants are free to use the Living room areas and Kitchen.  
There are front yard and backyard gardens too. 
All rooms come with personal dedicated bathroom. 
Rooms are air con and fully furnished with Bed, writing table, wardrobe, sofa, etc. 
There is wireless Broadband and  TV, provided by the Landlord, and utilities bill is taken care of by the Landlord. 
Tenants can use the common living areas and the kitchen to do meals. 
Washing machine and Refrigerator are available for common use. 
Total number of people in each room is restricted, to preserve the peaceful ambience and privacy for all tenants. Maximum per room is usually 2 persons. 
No agency fees involved.  
Rental Rates :  if two in a room, around $600PER PERSON  per month(negotiable) in BIG master room.  
Security deposit required:  (to be refunded upon proper hand over of room). 
Documents required: Copy of employment pass or Visit pass, copy of passport.

QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Very attractive Condo Room in Hillview Aenue (West of Singapore) for a cool guy (only for a male for single occupancy) - for a short term accommodation 
 
Furnished condo common room at lovely Merawoods in Hillview Avenue (around Bukit Batok, Postal code 669598) is available for a cool guy and a tidy guy! Fully furnished and a Specious room (3 x 3.4m). Condo with attractive facilities, newly renovated big swimming pool etc.  
 
Only 3 bus stops (or 15 minutes walking) to Hillview MRT, around 5 bus stops to bukit batok mrt, there is a shuttle bus goes directly from condo gate to the MRT to reach in less than 10 mnts, new express bus to CBD area directly from Hillview Av, direct buses to NUS / NUH/ CBD/Science Park, Harbour front etc(buses 963, 970, 176 etc). Direct transport arrangements to NTU.  
Very homely!  Only guys living in the flat and no family. There were a lot of young Europeans guys rented rooms upto now including 6 Germans, 5 French, British, Austrian etc. and had a very enjoyable time.  
 
Rent is only S$ 1050 Including utility bills and free wifi. (no agent fees involved ).  House is kept well cleaned and tidy!  
Please feel free to email/text me and discuss anything you wish. Hit me up, I will email you more photos and details.   
 
Cheers

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Modern Hougang MRT Private Bedroom For Rental Lease  
(sms / call / co-stay landlord Ben Lee: 9021-1846) 
 
- 3 min walk (70 metres away) to Hougang MRT NE 14 station 
- Private modern external renovated bathroom 
- fully furnished with aircon, fan, bed, wardrobe, study table, fans, 
- free pantry usage of fridge, washing machine, microwave oven, water heater, iron clothes, balcony to relax , enjoy the quiet view 
- clean fresh bedsheet , pillow for your comfort.  
- Ideal for couples, or for a working professional guy or lady. 
- high ceiling 
- inclusive aircon power supply bill, internet wifi 
- Rent all inclusive of utilities - no additional costs 
- Domestic helper available in the complex for cleaning (to be paid per use) 
 
Our place is modern new landed house, cosy home and to make sure our guests feel comfortable at home too. The area is very green and you can hear birds chirping constantly. You can also smell the morning dew when you open the full length windows every morning. There is also a private balcony that overlooks the greenery field. You can chill at the balcony or living room whenever u like.  
 
This studio master room is located on the 3rd, 4th floor of newly built 4 storey semi detached home. There are 3 to 4 studio master rooms on this floor while the landlord occupy the 1st and 2nd floor level.  However, because the rooms and common areas are very spacious and there is private passenger lift, thus there is a lot of privacy, even if the other bedroom is occupied. 
 
 
The Neighbourhood 
 
FOOD, AMENITIES WITHIN CLOSE PROXIMITY 
 
Nearby Hougang Mall shopping, neighbourhood food courts, nearby 24hr supermarket to get essential groceries, and  5 x food courts for affordable good food.  
- Walking distance to Hougang public swimming pool complex and Sport Complex gym as you wish during your stay. 
 
 
You name it, we've probably got it  
 
:) Plenty of good affordable vegetarian and non-vegetarian food options consisting of malay, indian, chinese, thai, italian, western, japanese, taiwan food, pizza, soup, Kentucky KFC, MacDonald, Subway, Starbuck and more. Money Changers, Sim cards, Photographic needs, Electronic needs, Post office, Banks, Police station, Swimming pool, Church, Temple, Mosque  
 
Getting around 
 
EXCELLENT LOCATION NEAR TRAIN STATIONS 
 
Public transport is very convenient where you can get walk to nearest Hougang MRT, within 5 mins ride reach Serangoon MRT ,  Serangoon NEX mega shopping. Serangoon mrt where you can change to north-east line or circle line to get everywhere in Singapore.  
 
- 20 min MRT ride to Dhoby Ghaut, Clark Quay, Chinatown MRT stations (Central Business District)

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
No agent-no owner-can cook & Great catch!!!  
2 nice Common Bed Rooms available immediately in the beautiful flat of a French artist, ground floor, with a living room totally open onto a lush garden, 2 MIN WALK FROM SOMERSET MRT (Orchard) in a quiet green low rise area with no traffic. 
Small street off Killiney road. 
The feeling is like living in the countryside right in the middle of the city!  
 
7/11 and plenty of small cheap restaurants and coffee shops just 20 meters away, 24h Fairprice supermarket 100m and Coldstorage just across Orchard Rd. 
 
MRT and buses to go anywhere in no time (direct, MRT 10 min), shopping on Orchard as much as you want, and Robertson Quay/Clark quay just 10 min walk for night life, 5 min walk to the River for jogs and walks, 5 min walk to Fort Canning park. 
 
The room: 12m2, cool, high ceilings, big window, AC, Fiber 300 WIFI internet, window with garden view, furnished with a double bed and desk + plenty of in-wall cupboard/wardrobe space. 
Clean and airy , with natural light, and the bathroom is shared with one flatmate only. 
 
The second room is bigger and nicer, available Feb 5th, or earlier (negotiable) for 1400+100 
 
Flatmates: It's me French female artist plus 2 young professionals, one Canadian works at Google and one French in IT. 
 
NO COUPLE  NO ROOM-SHARING, sorry. 
Available now - Minimum 11 months 
 
Rent is 1300 sgd   
Utilities+ Maid = 100 SGD/month 
conctact/SMS/whatsapp: Delphine +
  show contact info

  show contact info 
(call/sms/WhatsApp) 
Current flatmates: 2 male Indian professionals (one is single and another married with working professional Filipino wife) are occupying the other 2 rooms. They are very friendly, helpful and easy going people. 
 
Condo Location: Centrally located outside Toa Payoh and is near to the junction of Jalan Toa Payoh/serangoon Road Flyover (PIE) and is also near Potong Pasir MRT station (around 8 minutes walk; 15 minutes to Orchard Road and 10 minutes to Dhoby Ghaut by MRT, 2 MRT stations to nex Shopping Mall...), bus stops (within 2-4 minutes walk, with many buses going to the city, Raffles Place, Suntec City, Marina Financial Centre, Toa Payoh Centre, Little India/Mustafa and City Square Shopping Malls, downtown, Habourfront and various parts of Singapore), and amenities (shops, eateries, supermarkets, schools and banks). It is also very convenient for students who are studying in NUS-Bukit Timah Campus (already 3 batches NUS students stayed in this condo) and SMU-Bras Basah Road campus. 
 
Some e.g. of public transport connectivities:  
more than 5 bus numbers (3 stops only) toToa Payoh Centre; Bus  No.147 to Serangoon Centre (nex Shopping Centre); Bus 857 and Bus 133 to City Hall/Suntec in 20 mins; 5 bus stops to Lavender MRT; 3 bus stops to Little India/Kitchener Road; 3 bus stops via PIE to Eunos MRT station in 15 mins and 20 mins to Marin Parade... 
 
Condo Facilities: Swimming pool, gym, sauna, BBQ pit, playground, function hall, basement car/bicyclepark, 24-hour security, etc, and is facing the beautiful Kallang River with quiet and calm environment surrounded by palm trees and plants. It is excellent for study and staying. 
 
Unit Facilities: Big hall and patio, fully furnished with aircon, big wardrobes, sofa, dinning set, beds (a queen bed, computer table in this common room), 3 bathroom/toilets, fridge, TV, washing machine, cooker, oven, water heater, microwave-oven. . ..

Very attractive Condo Room in Hillview Aenue (West of Singapore) for a cool guy (only for a male for single occupancy) - for a short term accommodation 
 
Furnished condo common room at lovely Merawoods in Hillview Avenue (around Bukit Batok, Postal code 669598) is available for a cool guy and a tidy guy! Fully furnished and a Specious room (3 x 3.4m). Condo with attractive facilities, newly renovated big swimming pool etc.  
 
Only 3 bus stops (or 15 minutes walking) to Hillview MRT, around 5 bus stops to bukit batok mrt, there is a shuttle bus goes directly from condo gate to the MRT to reach in less than 10 mnts, new express bus to CBD area directly from Hillview Av, direct buses to NUS / NUH/ CBD/Science Park, Harbour front etc(buses 963, 970, 176 etc). Direct transport arrangements to NTU.  
Very homely!  Only guys living in the flat and no family. There were a lot of young Europeans guys rented rooms upto now including 6 Germans, 5 French, British, Austrian etc. and had a very enjoyable time.  
 
Rent is only S$ 1050 Including utility bills and free wifi. (no agent fees involved ).  House is kept well cleaned and tidy!  
Please feel free to email/text me and discuss anything you wish. Hit me up, I will email you more photos and details.   
 
Cheers

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Modern Hougang MRT Private Bedroom For Rental Lease  
(sms / call / co-stay landlord Ben Lee: 9021-1846) 
 
- 3 min walk (70 metres away) to Hougang MRT NE 14 station 
- Private modern external renovated bathroom 
- fully furnished with aircon, fan, bed, wardrobe, study table, fans, 
- free pantry usage of fridge, washing machine, microwave oven, water heater, iron clothes, balcony to relax , enjoy the quiet view 
- clean fresh bedsheet , pillow for your comfort.  
- Ideal for couples, or for a working professional guy or lady. 
- high ceiling 
- inclusive aircon power supply bill, internet wifi 
- Rent all inclusive of utilities - no additional costs 
- Domestic helper available in the complex for cleaning (to be paid per use) 
 
Our place is modern new landed house, cosy home and to make sure our guests feel comfortable at home too. The area is very green and you can hear birds chirping constantly. You can also smell the morning dew when you open the full length windows every morning. There is also a private balcony that overlooks the greenery field. You can chill at the balcony or living room whenever u like.  
 
This studio master room is located on the 3rd, 4th floor of newly built 4 storey semi detached home. There are 3 to 4 studio master rooms on this floor while the landlord occupy the 1st and 2nd floor level.  However, because the rooms and common areas are very spacious and there is private passenger lift, thus there is a lot of privacy, even if the other bedroom is occupied. 
 
 
The Neighbourhood 
 
FOOD, AMENITIES WITHIN CLOSE PROXIMITY 
 
Nearby Hougang Mall shopping, neighbourhood food courts, nearby 24hr supermarket to get essential groceries, and  5 x food courts for affordable good food.  
- Walking distance to Hougang public swimming pool complex and Sport Complex gym as you wish during your stay. 
 
 
You name it, we've probably got it  
 
:) Plenty of good affordable vegetarian and non-vegetarian food options consisting of malay, indian, chinese, thai, italian, western, japanese, taiwan food, pizza, soup, Kentucky KFC, MacDonald, Subway, Starbuck and more. Money Changers, Sim cards, Photographic needs, Electronic needs, Post office, Banks, Police station, Swimming pool, Church, Temple, Mosque  
 
Getting around 
 
EXCELLENT LOCATION NEAR TRAIN STATIONS 
 
Public transport is very convenient where you can get walk to nearest Hougang MRT, within 5 mins ride reach Serangoon MRT ,  Serangoon NEX mega shopping. Serangoon mrt where you can change to north-east line or circle line to get everywhere in Singapore.  
 
- 20 min MRT ride to Dhoby Ghaut, Clark Quay, Chinatown MRT stations (Central Business District)

No agent-no owner-can cook & Great catch!!!  
2 nice Common Bed Rooms available immediately in the beautiful flat of a French artist, ground floor, with a living room totally open onto a lush garden, 2 MIN WALK FROM SOMERSET MRT (Orchard) in a quiet green low rise area with no traffic. 
Small street off Killiney road. 
The feeling is like living in the countryside right in the middle of the city!  
 
7/11 and plenty of small cheap restaurants and coffee shops just 20 meters away, 24h Fairprice supermarket 100m and Coldstorage just across Orchard Rd. 
 
MRT and buses to go anywhere in no time (direct, MRT 10 min), shopping on Orchard as much as you want, and Robertson Quay/Clark quay just 10 min walk for night life, 5 min walk to the River for jogs and walks, 5 min walk to Fort Canning park. 
 
The room: 12m2, cool, high ceilings, big window, AC, Fiber 300 WIFI internet, window with garden view, furnished with a double bed and desk + plenty of in-wall cupboard/wardrobe space.

Condo Location: Centrally located outside Toa Payoh and is near to the junction of Jalan Toa Payoh/serangoon Road Flyover (PIE) and is also near Potong Pasir MRT station (around 8 minutes walk; 15 minutes to Orchard Road and 10 minutes to Dhoby Ghaut by MRT, 2 MRT stations to nex Shopping Mall...), bus stops (within 2-4 minutes walk, with many buses going to the city, Raffles Place, Suntec City, Marina Financial Centre, Toa Payoh Centre, Little India/Mustafa and City Square Shopping Malls, downtown, Habourfront and various parts of Singapore), and amenities (shops, eateries, supermarkets, schools and banks). Very attractive Condo Room in Hillview Aenue (West of Singapore) for a cool guy (only for a male for single occupancy) - for a short term accommodation 
 
Furnished condo common room at lovely Merawoods in Hillview Avenue (around Bukit Batok, Postal code 669598) is available for a cool guy and a tidy guy! Fully furnished and a Specious room (3 x 3.4m). Condo with attractive facilities, newly renovated big swimming pool etc.  
 
Only 3 bus stops (or 15 minutes walking) to Hillview MRT, around 5 bus stops to bukit batok mrt, there is a shuttle bus goes directly from condo gate to the MRT to reach in less than 10 mnts, new express bus to CBD area directly from Hillview Av, direct buses to NUS / NUH/ CBD/Science Park, Harbour front etc(buses 963, 970, 176 etc). Direct transport arrangements to NTU.  
Very homely!  Only guys living in the flat and no family. There were a lot of young Europeans guys rented rooms upto now including 6 Germans, 5 French, British, Austrian etc. and had a very enjoyable time.  
 
Rent is only S$ 1050 Including utility bills and free wifi. (no agent fees involved ).  House is kept well cleaned and tidy!  
Please feel free to email/text me and discuss anything you wish. Hit me up, I will email you more photos and details.   
 
Cheers
title: Spacious room in a condo for cheap price! for short term!

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Modern Hougang MRT Private Bedroom For Rental Lease  
(sms / call / co-stay landlord Ben Lee: 9021-1846) 
 
- 3 min walk (70 metres away) to Hougang MRT NE 14 station 
- Private modern external renovated bathroom 
- fully furnished with aircon, fan, bed, wardrobe, study table, fans, 
- free pantry usage of fridge, washing machine, microwave oven, water heater, iron clothes, balcony to relax , enjoy the quiet view 
- clean fresh bedsheet , pillow for your comfort.  
- Ideal for couples, or for a working professional guy or lady. 
- high ceiling 
- inclusive aircon power supply bill, internet wifi 
- Rent all inclusive of utilities - no additional costs 
- Domestic helper available in the complex for cleaning (to be paid per use) 
 
Our place is modern new landed house, cosy home and to make sure our guests feel comfortable at home too. The area is very green and you can hear birds chirping constantly. You can also smell the morning dew when you open the full length windows every morning. There is also a private balcony that overlooks the greenery field. You can chill at the balcony or living room whenever u like.  
 
This studio master room is located on the 3rd, 4th floor of newly built 4 storey semi detached home. There are 3 to 4 studio master rooms on this floor while the landlord occupy the 1st and 2nd floor level.  However, because the rooms and common areas are very spacious and there is private passenger lift, thus there is a lot of privacy, even if the other bedroom is occupied. 
 
 
The Neighbourhood 
 
FOOD, AMENITIES WITHIN CLOSE PROXIMITY 
 
Nearby Hougang Mall shopping, neighbourhood food courts, nearby 24hr supermarket to get essential groceries, and  5 x food courts for affordable good food.  
- Walking distance to Hougang public swimming pool complex and Sport Complex gym as you wish during your stay. 
 
 
You name it, we've probably got it  
 
:) Plenty of good affordable vegetarian and non-vegetarian food options consisting of malay, indian, chinese, thai, italian, western, japanese, taiwan food, pizza, soup, Kentucky KFC, MacDonald, Subway, Starbuck and more. Money Changers, Sim cards, Photographic needs, Electronic needs, Post office, Banks, Police station, Swimming pool, Church, Temple, Mosque  
 
Getting around 
 
EXCELLENT LOCATION NEAR TRAIN STATIONS 
 
Public transport is very convenient where you can get walk to nearest Hougang MRT, within 5 mins ride reach Serangoon MRT ,  Serangoon NEX mega shopping. Serangoon mrt where you can change to north-east line or circle line to get everywhere in Singapore.  
 
- 20 min MRT ride to Dhoby Ghaut, Clark Quay, Chinatown MRT stations (Central Business District)
title: Hougang MRT 1F Common Bedroom For Rent Lease

Modern Hougang MRT Studio / Private Master Bedroom with Private Attach Ensuite Bathroom For Rental Lease (sms / call / co-stay with landlord Ben Lee: 8288-3501) 
 
- 3 min walk (70 metres away) to Hougang MRT NE 14 station 
- Modern renovated, external sharing bathroom sharing 
- fully furnished with aircon, fan, queen size bed, wardrobe, study table,  
- free pantry usage of fridge, washing machine, microwave oven, water heater, iron clothes,  
- clean fresh bedsheet, pillow for your comfort.  
- Ideal for couples, or for a working professional guy or lady 
- No smoker 
- high ceiling 
- inclusive aircon power supply bill, internet wifi 
- Rent all inclusive of utilities - no additional costs 
- Domestic helper available in the complex for cleaning (to be paid per use) 
 
This studio master room is located on the 3rd & 4th floor of newly built 4 storey semi detached home. Co-stay with the landlord family occupy the 1st and 2nd floor level.  However, because the rooms and common areas are very spacious and there is private passenger lift, thus there is a lot of privacy, even if the other bedroom is occupied. 
 
 
The Neighbourhood 
 
FOOD , AMENITIES WITHIN CLOSE PROXIMITY 
 
Nearby Hougang Mall shopping, neighbourhood food courts, nearby 24hr supermarket to get essential groceries, and  5 x food courts. 
- Walking distance to Hougang public swimming pool complex and Sport Complex gym as you wish during your stay. 
 
EXCELLENT LOCATION NEAR TRAIN STATIONS 
 
Public transport is very convenient where you can get walk to nearest Hougang MRT, within 5 mins ride reach Serangoon MRT, Serangoon NEX mega shopping. Serangoon mrt where you can change to north-east line or circle line to get everywhere in Singapore.  
 
- 20 min MRT ride to Dhoby Ghaut, Clark Quay, Chinatown MRT stations (Central Business District)

Junior suite with attached bathroom for rent in great apartment at Double Bay Residences in Simei. You'll be taking over my lease from February 12th, so no agent charges or commissions.  
 
Room has queen size bed and ensuite bathroom. New furnishings. Common area has large kitchen and large living room & balcony. Has all amenities like washer, over, refrigerator, A/C units, etc.  
 
Room mates all quiet, clean, working professionals and rarely use common areas. Internet included, utilities split (average about S$50 per person/month).  
 
Includes access to pool, gym, tennis courts, game room, basketball court, etc. Really nice condo (http://www.dbr.com.sg/) 
 
5 minutes from Simei MRT, FairPrice, & mall.  
 
Landlord does not allow Indians unfortunately.

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
No agent-no owner-can cook & Great catch!!!  
2 nice Common Bed Rooms available immediately in the beautiful flat of a French artist, ground floor, with a living room totally open onto a lush garden, 2 MIN WALK FROM SOMERSET MRT (Orchard) in a quiet green low rise area with no traffic. 
Small street off Killiney road. 
The feeling is like living in the countryside right in the middle of the city!  
 
7/11 and plenty of small cheap restaurants and coffee shops just 20 meters away, 24h Fairprice supermarket 100m and Coldstorage just across Orchard Rd. 
 
MRT and buses to go anywhere in no time (direct, MRT 10 min), shopping on Orchard as much as you want, and Robertson Quay/Clark quay just 10 min walk for night life, 5 min walk to the River for jogs and walks, 5 min walk to Fort Canning park. 
 
The room: 12m2, cool, high ceilings, big window, AC, Fiber 300 WIFI internet, window with garden view, furnished with a double bed and desk + plenty of in-wall cupboard/wardrobe space. 
Clean and airy , with natural light, and the bathroom is shared with one flatmate only. 
 
The second room is bigger and nicer, available Feb 5th, or earlier (negotiable) for 1400+100 
 
Flatmates: It's me French female artist plus 2 young professionals, one Canadian works at Google and one French in IT. 
 
NO COUPLE  NO ROOM-SHARING, sorry. 
Available now - Minimum 11 months 
 
Rent is 1300 sgd   
Utilities+ Maid = 100 SGD/month

A smart TV is a television set or set-top box with integrated Internet and is an example of technological convergence between computers and television sets and set-top boxes.

Modern Hougang MRT Studio / Private Master Bedroom with Private Attach Ensuite Bathroom For Rental Lease (sms / call landlord Ben Lee: 8288-3501) 
 
- 3 min walk (70 metres away) to Hougang MRT NE 14 station 
- Private modern, attach ensuite renovated bathroom 
- fully furnished with aircon, fan, queen size bed, wardrobe, study table, fans, LED TV,  
- Private balcony to enjoy greenery view 
- free pantry usage of fridge, washing machine, microwave oven, water heater, iron clothes, balcony to relax , enjoy the quiet view 
- clean fresh bedsheet, pillow for your comfort.  
- Ideal for couples without kids, or for a working professional guy or lady 
- high ceiling 
- inclusive aircon power supply bill, internet wifi 
- Rent all inclusive of utilities - no additional costs 
- Domestic helper available in the complex for cleaning (to be paid per use) 
 
This studio master room is located on the 3rd & 4th floor of newly built 4 storey semi detached home. Co-stay with the landlord family occupy the 1st and 2nd floor level.  However, because the rooms and common areas are very spacious and there is private passenger lift, thus there is a lot of privacy, even if the other bedroom is occupied. 
 
 
The Neighbourhood 
 
FOOD , AMENITIES WITHIN CLOSE PROXIMITY 
 
Nearby Hougang Mall shopping, neighbourhood food courts, nearby 24hr supermarket to get essential groceries, and  5 x food courts. 
- Walking distance to Hougang public swimming pool complex and Sport Complex gym as you wish during your stay. 
 
EXCELLENT LOCATION NEAR TRAIN STATIONS 
 
Public transport is very convenient where you can get walk to nearest Hougang MRT, within 5 mins ride reach Serangoon MRT, Serangoon NEX mega shopping. Serangoon mrt where you can change to north-east line or circle line to get everywhere in Singapore.  
 
- 20 min MRT ride to Dhoby Ghaut, Clark Quay, Chinatown MRT stations (Central Business District)
title: Hougang MRT 3F M2 Studio Master Room Attach Bathroom Rental
